lines.text: I mean, the idea would be to hide evidence from the police, right?
''Burn it, burn it all! Don't let a shred of the truth fall into their tyrannical hands!''
...Yeah, that ain't unlikely, to be honest.
Still, you're gonna need somethin' more specific than ''some evidence'' to make any progress.
...Man, what? I need to know what evidence doesn't exist anymore?
Well, it coulda left traces. Or maybe it's somethin' that <c=#FF00FF>didn't burn completely away.</c>
